title: Looking for People who stream the following champions

replies.body: There is a site that lets you watch live through you client of high elo players, it isn't region locked either, so you could watch a korean akali main, then after that, watch a NA viegar main, no patching needed. It also helps because it shows you what they are maxing, and building and %%%%, in real time. Lolsummoners.net or something.
Okay, it's not that site, I can't remember what the site was, but it also had charts and stuff.
Bjersen streams Anivia Syndra Yasuo and other mid champs...
